Then, I'll make a restaurant.

topics.body:
What inspired me about space is when I was a kid.

I was a pretty religious kid back in the day but on one day at the library, I came across a small book about the Universe.
And then, my mind just got blown.

It was fascinating, amazing, incredible and just outright awesome! The Big Bang, The Milky Way, Saturn's rings, the Asteroid Belt, constellations, Venus's heat, the Sun's nuclear fusion!

I got engrossed with it and loved it since.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a1fba3636872722b2b1000#post_54a1fba3636872722b2b1000
The concept of space fascinates me honestly
Most human beings have never been somewhere where there just isn't 
There's always something in front of you
If not for the whole brutal and painful death thing, space would be super good for naps
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9
